  • Method Details

    • projectFinalize

      public static void projectFinalize​(java.sql.Statement statement, java.sql.Connection connection)
      Finalizes a project using either the project number or the project name.

      Prints all company projects to user. Takes user search option, calls appropriate methods to search project from poisepms database. Checks if project paid up, if paid up, present user with finalization options. If not paid up, presents user with invoice for Client with accompanying details.

      Parameters:
      statement - on an existing connection.
      connection - with poisepms database.

    • getFinalizedProjectName

      public static void getFinalizedProjectName​(java.sql.Connection connection, java.sql.Statement statement, java.lang.String projectCompletion, java.lang.String projectName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Uses project name to search for project and Finalize project.

      Passes sql statement to database to get total fee and paid to date. Loops through result from data base, checks if paid up or not then presents appropriate options to user given paid up status of project. If project paid up, finalize project If project not paid up then present user with invoice for client.

      Parameters:
      connection - with poisepms database.
      statement - statement on an existing connection.
      projectCompletion - to change project completion status.
      projectName - to search for specific project from poisepms database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getFinalizedProjectNumber

      public static void getFinalizedProjectNumber​(java.sql.Connection connection, java.sql.Statement statement, java.lang.String projectCompletion, int projectNumber) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Uses project number to search database for project to finalize.

      Passes sql statement to database to get total fee and paid to date. Loops through result from data base, checks if paid up or not then presents appropriate options to user given paid up status of project. If project paid up, finalize project If project not paid up then present user with invoice for client.

      Parameters:
      connection - with poisepms database
      statement - statement on an existing connection.
      projectCompletion - to change project completion status.
      projectNumber - to search for specific project from poisepms database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
